duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead medium to large projects through the project development life cycle, working closely with sponsors and Systems counterparts.
Manage project scope, develop project plan, and manage project budget.
Execute project tasks, mitigate project risks, resolve issues, and manage resources to meet project goals and deliverables.
Lead a team of subject matter experts, analysts, and other participants to ensure successful project execution.
Provide coaching and performance feedback for project team members and communicate effectively with project sponsors and stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA degree and/or equivalent work experience
